{{cpp/title|wcsftime}}
{{cpp/chrono/c/navbar}}
{{ddcl|header=cwchar|
std::size_t wcsftime( wchar_t* str, std::size_t count, const wchar_t* format, const std::tm* time );
}}

Converts the date and time information from a given calendar time {{c|time}} to a null-terminated wide character string {{c|str}} according to [[#Format string|format string]] {{c|format}}. Up to {{c|count}} wide characters are written.

===Parameters===
{{par begin}}
{{par|str|pointer to the first element of the {{c|wchar_t}} array for output}}
{{par|count|maximum number of wide characters to write}}
{{par|format|pointer to a null-terminated wide character string specifying the [[#Format string|format of conversion]]}}
{{par|time|pointer to the date and time information to be converted}}
{{par end}}

===Format string===
{{cpp/chrono/c/strftime format}}

===Return value===
Number of wide characters written into the wide character array pointed to by {{c|str}} not including the terminating {{c|L'\0'}} on success. If {{c|count}} was reached before the entire string could be stored, {{c|0}} is returned and the contents are undefined.

===Example===
{{example
|code=
#include &lt;ctime&gt;
#include &lt;cwchar&gt;
#include &lt;iostream&gt;
#include &lt;locale&gt;

int main()
{
    std::locale::global(std::locale("ja_JP.utf8"));
    std::time_t t = std::time(nullptr);
    wchar_t wstr[100];
    if (std::wcsftime(wstr, 100, L"%A %c", std::localtime(&amp;t)))
        std::wcout &lt;&lt; wstr &lt;&lt; '\n';
}
|p=true
|output=
火曜日 2011年12月27日 17時43分13秒
}}
